_sText:
----Hosties Immortal---

New map i made recently, the name comes from me (and the healing water)

1 cell
S4S
Huge Wall
Detailed spawn
Rebel way

I wont tell you everything, you MUST download to know... :D

EDIT: Important that you remove BLOOM in your video settings if the lighting is really bright. I will try and fix the glitch maybe in the next version. BUT for now simply remove HDR bloom from your video settings and you're done. ;)

Have fun 

(i actually already made a huge description but the page expired and i lost it all =/
